name: Asparagus - Cowl Pdf pattern
description:
Fashion is something real at our age.
Cowls became one of the most fashionable accessory in the last years. I’ve got the hint when I cut my hair so short, I need more cowls! So I designed this color combo cowl and the lace motive let me think about asparagus!
Enjoy!

- the listing is for the PDF PATTERN - only, not the knitted item.

Craft: Knitting

Category:
Neck / Torso → Scarf
Neck / Torso → Cowl
Neck / Torso → Shawl / Wrap

Yarns suggested: Knoll kilcarra tweed

Yarn weight: Worsted / 10 ply (9 wpi) [Information on yarn weights]

Gauge: 16 stitches and 16 rows = 4 inches in stockinette stitch
Needle size: US 9 - 5.5 mm

Yardage: 130 - 160 yards (119 - 146 m)

Sizes available:one size

name: Magical Sparrow's eyes hat - PDF pattern
description:
I've designed this lovely, very easy and fast hat pattern, it makes me happy every time I wore it! Knitted in the round with circular needle; worsted yarn requirement (i.e. 1 hank of Malabrigo worsted yarn);
The hat was tested by 4 knitters before going on sale.
Happy knitting and get a bit of magical dust over your head wearing it!

After I've received the payment, you'll get a mail with the pdf file's link to download it.

name: Knitters Notebook Moleskine - for happy knitters - hand drawn and painted
description:
A hand drawn & painted Moleskine notebook that makes taking knit's notes more happier and easy.

As a knitter and designer I use notebook to take note of my pattern, sketch ideas and so on.
I always would love to have a knit related notebook cover as well. On the back a quote by Elizabeth Zimmerman.

Moleskine Cahier EXTRA LARGE Squared Notebooks with squared (graph) pages, each with a heavy duty cardboard cover with visible stitching on the spine.
Moleskine Cahier journals each 7.5 by 10 inches and containing 120 pages (60 leaves), with the last 16 sheets detachable. The size of the grid is .5 cm square (approximately 5 squares to an inch).

Style: Squared (graph) pages
Pages: 120 pages (60 leaves)
Size: 7.5 x 10 inches (19 x 25 cm)
Cover Style: Soft cover - hand sketched/painted

Illustration and design © Bubiknits. All rights reserved.
